subject: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Dear Ronald

Thank you for your urgent response concerning my proposal , i really
appreciate it

Dear Sir


Am so glad and happy to hear from you i really appreciate your prompt
response towards my proposal. Befor ever i decided contacting you i went on
my knees for a divine direction and protection ,all i need from you is
trust and sincerity in making sure this goal is achieved without any
problems,i hope you are capable of handling this project ? for me i have
chosen you to stand for me as a partner and investment associate.

This is only what I inherited from my parents before their untimely death.
The only hope I have in this world is this deposit. Please do not cheat or
disappoint me and I have trusted you more for sending me your ID photo. It
signifies trust. Once we are done 20% of the total amount shall be yours
for a job well done then after that we shall plan on how to invest in any
lucrative business of our choice.I repeat do not disappoint me , once am
satisfy with you i will send you contact details of the security storage
company where my funds are stored so that they will give you the modalities
on how you will receive my funds in your country once received in your
account i will start planning my trip to meet with you.

Sir all i need is your trust and advise i don't want to make any mistake
along the line please ,assure me give me more confident to deal with
because i cant afford to loose my funds to unknown person.

However, I appreciate your prompt response.



Kindly send me again your details



Home address..............


Office address.................


Direct cell phone ...............


Your ID

Once I receive these details I will link you and the storage company. You
will then open up communication with the security storage company whether
you contact them or they contact you. Finally ,once I link you up with the

storage company you then now start communicating for proceeds on how you
will receive my funds without any hassles .

Sincerely

Joseph Sermani#







Hello Mr. Joseph Sermani,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. It sounds
like you've been through a lot and I appreciate your trust in considering
me to help manage your investment.

I'm curious about the type of business ventures you're interested in. Are
there any specific industries or sectors that you have in mind? Also, could
you tell me more about how the diamond export business worked? It sounds
fascinating!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Mr. Ronald,

Thank you for your kind response and willingness to assist me in this matter. I am indeed interested in various business ventures, particularly those related to real estate, agriculture, and technology. However, I am open to other lucrative sectors as well.

As for the diamond export business, it was a family business that my parents were involved in. They had connections with diamond miners and dealers across Africa and used these connections to buy diamonds at a lower price. Then they would export these diamonds to buyers in Europe and America.

I hope this gives you a better understanding of my background. Please let me know if there are any other questions you have or any other information you need from me.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Mr. Ronald,

Thank you for your kind response and willingness to assist me in this matter. I am indeed interested in various business ventures, particularly those related to real estate, agriculture, and technology. However, I am open to any lucrative opportunities that you might suggest.

As for the diamond export business, it was a family enterprise handed down from my father. We had mining rights in certain areas rich with diamonds and other precious stones. The process involved mining the diamonds, getting them cut and polished, then exporting them to various parts of the world where they were sold at premium prices.

I hope this gives you a clearer picture of my previous line of work. I look forward to hearing more about your ideas on potential investment opportunities.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Mr. Ronald,

Thank you for your kind response and willingness to assist me in this matter. I am indeed going through a lot, and your understanding means the world to me.

As for business ventures, I have always been interested in real estate and agriculture. However, I am open to other lucrative sectors that you might suggest based on your experience and knowledge of the market in your country.

The diamond export business was quite complex. It involved sourcing diamonds from local miners, processing them, and then exporting them to international buyers. The process required a deep understanding of the diamond market, as well as strong connections with both local miners and international buyers.

I hope this gives you a better understanding of my background and interests. Please feel free to ask any further questions you might have.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Mr. Joseph Sermani,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your situation with me. It sounds like you've been through a lot and I appreciate your trust in me to help manage your inheritance.

I'm curious about the type of business ventures you're interested in. Are there any specific industries or sectors that you have in mind? Also, could you tell me more about how the diamond export business worked? It sounds fascinating!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Ronald

tHNSK for your kind response,i really appreciate ,Please kindly respond to
my previous email ...Whatever business you have at heart that is okay and
lucrative we can venture into it for progress.

Please, I need your contact details .
Sincerely
Joseph

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Joseph,

Thank you for your response. I'm glad to hear that you're interested in discussing potential business ventures. Could you please provide more details about the kind of business you have in mind? 

I must apologize, but I prefer not to share my contact details over email. However, I am more than happy to continue our conversation here.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ronald

subject: Re: From Joseph Sermani
body:
Hello Mr. Ronald,

Thank you for your kind response and willingness to assist me in this matter. I am indeed interested in various business ventures, particularly those related to real estate, agriculture, and technology. However, I am open to any lucrative opportunities that you might suggest.

As for the diamond export business, it was a family enterprise handed down from my parents. We had mining sites where we extracted the diamonds and then exported them to different parts of the world. It was a profitable venture until political instability led to its downfall.

I hope this gives you a clearer picture of my interests and background. Please feel free to ask if you have more questions or need further clarification on anything.

Best wishes,
Ronald
